author: Gary J. Milne
releaseNotes:
Version 1.0.8: Handles error in Zigbee routing data that can occur in some devices.
Version 1.0.7: Fixes exception error in the helathCheck operation. 
Version 1.0.6: Update to handle change in JSON path around H.E. version 2.3.7.1 that would prevent name resolution from working in newer versions of HE.
